settings.customtext_block: The aesthetic of OAMC's SS18 collection is informed by the current state of consciousness. What is truly necessary is a positive, constructive, inclusive attitude instead of the rampant spread of negativity. Only through a higher education and a higher consciousness can this be achieved. It is truly up to the individual, the collective of individuals, to create significant and lasting change. #onealwaysmoreconscious #peopleforpeace

settings.title: Our Shop
settings.body_text:
Roden Gray aims to be the leading source in menswear that showcases the ever-evolving nature and diversity in brands from all around the world. After over ten years in business, our goal remains to bring together
a unique curation of brands, new and core that celebrate culture and diversity, that share a respect for quality design, and that highlight the beautiful and
functional details.

We strive to redefine a connection to menswear by
allowing our community to embrace and embody the
stories, the education, and the perspective of the
brands found in store and online.

settings.title: Shop Details
settings.body_text:
Shop Hours


Monday - Sunday 12pm - 6pm

Contact

Vancouver, BC
V6B 1A4
Canada

settings.title: Product Information
settings.body:
Sizing

Sizes differ from varying designers. Model measurements are provided to help in the decision on preferred size. For exact measurements of a garment, please contact Customer Care at support@rodengray.com

Shoe sizes are listed in US sizing unless otherwise specified.

Product Authentication

Roden Gray guarantees the authenticity of every product we stock. Certain items may also include the designer's own proof of authenticity, such as an authenticity card, dust bag, etc.

settings.title: Payment Information
settings.body:
Exchange Rates

All transactions are made in Canadian dollars. All currency conversion information provided on this site is for informational purposes only. The exchange rate that is used when making a purchase is determined by your credit card provider at the time of purchase.

Refunds are processed in Canadian dollars. Because exchange rates vary from day to day, refunds made to international customers may differ slightly from the purchase amount. Any such variances may also be due to fees charged by credit card issuers and payment institutions. These factors are outside our control and we cannot be held responsible for such variances.

Payment Methods

We accept payment by Visa, Mastercard, American Express, PayPal, Sezzle, WeChat Pay, AliPay, and UnionPay.

Occasionally, we may require additional information to verify your identity. In this case we will contact you by email or by telephone. We reserve the right to cancel an order for any reason.

Pre-Orders

Purchase of items marked "Pre-order" is not a guarantee of delivery and may be cancelled due to factors outside of our control, such as production, logistical, or quality control issues. Delivery dates provided in pre-order item descriptions are estimates and subject to change. Pre-order items are non-refundable and may be returned for exchange or store credit only.

settings.title: Your Order
settings.body:
COVID-19


Due to limited resources for processing orders during this time, online orders may experience delays of 3-5 business days before shipping. Please contact support@rodengray.com for any questions or concerns placing your order. In accordance with public social distancing recommendations, all employees capable of working remotely are doing so. When processing orders, we are being diligent with cleaning and sterilization procedures to further reduce any risks. Thank you for your support and understanding during these trying times.

Order Processing


All orders placed Monday-Friday (excluding holidays) before 2PM PST will begin processing that day and ship within 2 business days, pending item availability and credit card verification. Orders placed after 2PM PST will begin processing the next business day. Orders placed on Friday after 2PM PST will begin processing the following Monday. Transit times do not include Saturday, Sunday or holidays.

Order processing cut-off times are provided as guidelines only, and do not take into account possible delays caused by item availability and payment verification.  We reserve the right to cancel any order for issues of payment and the right to limit quantities for exclusive releases.

If you have any concern at all that your package will not make it on time please email us at support@rodengray.com or call us at 604-709-0259 before placing your order.

settings.title: Shipping & Handling
settings.body:
COVID-19

Due to limited resources for processing orders during this time, online orders may experience delays of 3-5 business days before shipping. Please contact support@rodengray.com for any questions or concerns placing your order. In accordance with public social distancing recommendations, all employees capable of working remotely are doing so. When processing orders, we are being diligent with cleaning and sterilization procedures to further reduce any risks. Thank you for your support and understanding during these trying times.

Shipping & Handling

We utilize Canada Post for all domestic orders unless specified. For US and International orders, we offer DHL service. If you do not see your destination listed upon checkout please contact us for further assistance.

Please note that orders will only be shipped once payment and delivery details have been approved. Delivery time frames begin from the date of dispatch. All orders are trackable.

All orders will require signature upon delivery. Roden Gray will not assume the risk of loss and title for merchandise for any orders that opt for no signature requirement.

Please see below for shipping rates:

Canada

Flat rate via Canada Post Expedited
 2-7 Business Days $15
Purolator Express
 1-2 Business Days $35

USA

Flat rate via USPS                             
3-5 Business Days $20
DHL Express

 Next Day $25

International

DHL Express                                      
2-6 Business Days $55


In-Store Pickup


In-Store Pickup is available free of charge. This option is available upon checkout who customers who wish to retrieve their items from our retail location.

International Shipping


Roden Gray uses DHL for all international deliveries. Rates are calculated based on destination and weight of the package. All additional taxes, customs and import duties levied by the client’s local government are the responsibility of the client.

Items will be shipped from Vancouver, Canada with an official invoice declaring the exact total of merchandise purchased in Canadian dollars.

Lost & Damaged Orders


In the rare occasion, Roden Gray Inc. shall not be held liable for any direct or indirect damages done by any services provided. All items are purchased at your own risk. Any damage caused during shipment is the responsibility of the postal service/courier. Roden Gray Inc. does not assume any responsibility for lost or stolen items.

settings.title: Return Policy
settings.body:
Holiday Return Policy


In-store

Regular priced items in original, unworn condition with tags purchased in-store between December 4th-25th are eligible for an exchange/store credit up until January 8th, 2021. No returns will be accepted on Boxing Day (December 26th). All purchases made after December 25th, 2020 will be subject to our standard return policy.


Online

Regular priced items in original, unworn condition with tags purchased online between December 4th-25th are eligible for an exchange/refund up until January 8th, 2021. No returns will be accepted on Boxing Day (December 26th). All purchases made after December 25th, 2020 will be subject to our standard return policy.



Store Returns


Regular priced items in unworn, original condition (or sale items sold below 30% discount) are eligible for a return for store credit only, within 14 days of purchase.


Items purchased within 7 days of a permanent price markdown are eligible for an adjustment equal to the difference in price. This difference will be rewarded as store credit only.


Fragrances, candles and jewelry are exempt and will be considered final sale upon purchase. All returns must be accompanied by an original receipt or they will not be accepted.



Online Orders


Returns in Canada


Regular priced items in unworn, original condition (or sale items sold below 30% discount) are eligible for an online return or exchange. The return or exchange must be requested within 7 days of delivery as indicated by the customer’s provided tracking number. Any items sold at 30% discount or higher will be considered a final sale and will not be eligible for an online return or exchange.


Return shipping is free for customers returning or exchanging regular priced items within Canada. Request a return or exchange using the button at the bottom of this page to receive your shipping label.


US Returns


Regular priced items in unworn, original condition (or sale items sold below 30% discount) are eligible for an online return or exchange. The return or exchange must be requested within 7 days of delivery as indicated by the customer’s provided tracking number. Any items sold at 30% discount or higher will be considered a final sale and will not be eligible for an online return or exchange.


USA customers returning or exchanging items must cover return shipping costs and ship via USPS or DHL. Returns made via separate channels will incur duties that will then be deducted from your expected refund.


Returned items must be declared as “Returned Goods” on the customs section of the return label. Improperly declared returns may incur additional fees by customs. Please choose a service that is trackable as we are not responsible for damaged or lost returns. Request a return or exchange using the button at the bottom of this page to receive your shipping label.


International Returns


Regular priced items in unworn, original condition (or sale items sold below 30% discount) are eligible for an online return or exchange. The return or exchange must be requested within 7 days of delivery as indicated by the customer’s provided tracking number. Any items sold at 30% discount or higher will be considered a final sale and will not be eligible for an online return or exchange.


International customers returning or exchanging items must cover return shipping costs and must ship via DHL. Returns made via separate channels will incur duties that will then be deducted from your expected refund.


Returned items must be declared as “Returned Goods” on the customs section of the return label. Improperly declared returns may incur additional fees by customs. Please choose a service that is trackable as we are not responsible for damaged or lost returns. Request a return or exchange using the button at the bottom of this page to receive your shipping label.



Request a Return


Return Shipping Address


Roden Gray
Attn: Returns RA#(your return number)
386 Powell Street
V6A 1G4
Canada

settings.heading: Join our Team
settings.body:
Since 2007 Roden Gray has been a leader in the Vancouver fashion market and starting in 2010 we opened our doors to the world with RODENGRAY.COM. With one of the largest selections of exclusive brands available in North America, we pride ourselves in offering an unforgettable experience to our customers every time they visit us, both in-store and online.

Do you have a passion for men's fashion? Do you believe style is something essential and accessible to everyone? We're seeking talented, motivated individuals to add to our ever-growing team. If you think you're a good fit, we'd love to hear from you.

Please contact support@rodengray.com for any questions or concerns placing your order. In accordance with public social distancing recommendations, all employees capable of working remotely are doing so.


When processing orders, we are being diligent with cleaning and sterilization procedures to further reduce any risks. Thank you for your support and understanding during these trying times.
